programme.title: My Christmas Family Tree
programme.desc: After taking a Family Tree DNA test, Vanessa learns of a family that she didn't even know existed, and decides to travel to their home for the holidays.

programme.title: A Dickens of a Holiday!
programme.desc: In order to make the most of her hometown's 100th annual Victorian festival a success, a woman invites an action star, and her former high school classmate, to play Scrooge in.

programme.title: Sister Swap: Christmas in the City
programme.desc: Two sisters decide to swap cities in order to pursue new projects for the twelve days leading up to Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas Next Door
programme.desc: The author of bachelor lifestyle books, is left in charge of his young niece and nephew for the holidays.

programme.title: Christmas Made to Order
programme.desc: A Christmas amateur finds himself in charge of his family's holiday celebration. Desperate for help, he enlists an expert in all things Christmas and together, they discover what's truly important in life.

programme.title: The Mistletoe Secret
programme.desc: A woman has big hopes for her town's big holiday adventure, until she meets the man behind the plan.

programme.title: Mingle All the Way
programme.desc: A young entrepreneur invents a new dating app designed to help singles find dates to events. She personally tests it out in the weeks before Christmas and is connected with a like-minded individual whom she's already dated, several times.

programme.title: Merry and Bright
programme.desc: Two people work together to make their candy-cane factory profitable, but in the end, it's their love that turns a profit.

programme.title: Christmas Connection
programme.desc: A flight attendant is asked to stay for Christmas by a family after she returns a package left on a plane by a passenger and misses her connection back home.

programme.title: It's Beginning to Look a Lot Like Christmas
programme.desc: When a New England Christmas decorating competition searches for the town with the most Christmas spirit, the Mayors of East and West Riverton go all out to get their towns to the top of the holiday heap.

programme.title: Never Kiss a Man in a Christmas Sweater
programme.desc: Single mom Maggie is facing Christmas alone until Lucas crashes into her life and becomes an unexpected houseguest. Together they overcome Christmas while finding comfort in their growing bond.

programme.title: Christmas at Castle Hart
programme.desc: Searching for her roots, Brooke Bennett goes to Ireland for Christmas. While there, she meets the charming Earl of Glaslough, and is hired to host his castle's Christmas party after being mistaken for an event planner.

programme.title: Christmas CEO
programme.desc: The CEO of a small toy company is presented with the offer of a lifetime when asked to merge with a mega toy company. However, she needs to get the signature of her estranged ex-husband in order to seal the deal.

programme.title: A Royal Queens Christmas
programme.desc: A woman from Queens enlists a prince to help with a local children's Christmas show.

programme.title: Coyote Creek Christmas
programme.desc: During a.

programme.title: Heart of the Holidays
programme.desc: A career-driven woman returns to her hometown for the holidays and faces her high-school boyfriend. Together, they rediscover what matters most in life.

programme.title: The Sweetest Christmas
programme.desc: A pastry chef makes it to the final round of a renowned baking competition and finds herself asking her high school sweetheart for help. As they grow closer, she realizes the must embrace the Christmas spirit or risk losing a chance at love.

programme.title: Christmas Under Wraps
programme.desc: A woman loses her job and beau on the same day and reluctantly accepts a position in Alaska. When she gets the position she originally hoped for, she must choose between a life she's always wanted and her new life in Alaska.

programme.title: Picture a Perfect Christmas
programme.desc: A world-travelling photographer takes some time off at Christmas to care for her grandmother. While there, she meets her neighbour, who needs help caring for his young nephew, and love develops.

programme.title: Sharing Christmas
programme.desc: A real estate developer is given the opportunity to transform an old shopping complex into a prime location. Unfortunately, there is one tenant who is holding out, the Christmas shop owner he met just days earlier.

programme.title: Christmas Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: A woman heads home for the holidays, things get complicated and she is forced to work together with her ex for the towns annual scavenger hunt.

programme.title: A Nashville Christmas Carol
programme.desc: A television producer is forced to work with the man who broke her heart on a country music Christmas special while being interrupted by Christmas spirits determined for her to revisit her past.

programme.title: Christmas in Tahoe
programme.desc: In order to save her family hotel's Christmas show, talent booker Claire needs to ask for help from Ryan, her ex-boyfriend, who is now the famous guitarist of a band that fired her years ago.

programme.title: On the 12th Date of Christmas
programme.desc: Two co-workers vying for the same promotion are tasked with creating a 12 Days of Christmas scavenger hunt to promote the premiere of a new hotel.
